lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 (AP) -- Forecasting attacks on the "heart of the Nipponese Empire," Vice Admiral John S. McCain, Deputy Chief of Naval Operations for Air, declared tonight that American sea and air power were now "being coordinated in such strength that we eventually will sink the major part of Japan's fleet.'
abstract: Vice Adm McCain repts US sea and air forces being coordinated in enough strength to sink major part of Jap fleet
